column4: hi, n00b to this, does the 'live CD' basically allow me to open the OS inside windows, allowing me to test for any faults that may happen with a complete installation?
oh ok, i think i get it, so can windows still be used, say, can I switch between the two OS's then?
nah, the live cd doesn't get housed in windows.
You have to put it into your disk drive and reboot
